name: Golden Wheat
description: Golden Wheat is premium-grade, sun-ripened whole grain harvested from the fertile fields of Rajshahi. With a naturally rich golden hue and high protein content, it's ideal for baking, grinding into flour, or preparing nutritious traditional meals. Grown organically by Abdul Rahman at Farm 35, this wheat is free from synthetic chemicals and processed with care to retain its wholesome quality. Whether you’re making rotis, bread, or porridges, it ensures both taste and nourishment.
features: Sun-dried and hand-harvested for maximum nutrient retention
Naturally high in protein and dietary fiber
Ideal for grinding into whole wheat flour (atta)
Supports local farmers and sustainable agriculture
Packed fresh and delivered with zero preservatives
Perfect for traditional recipes like roti, bread, and porridge
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container to preserve freshness. Avoid exposure to moisture and direct sunlight. Shelf life is up to 12 months if stored properly.

reviews.comment: Excellent quality wheat! The flour made from this wheat is fresh and perfect for traditional breads.
I love that it's organic and locally sourced. The grain is full of flavor and cooks well.
Very good wheat. The texture is great and it stays fresh longer than other brands.

name: Green Cauliflower
description: Green Cauliflower is a vibrant, nutrient-dense vegetable known for its unique color and slightly sweeter, nuttier taste compared to white cauliflower. Grown locally by farmer Fatema Begum at Farm 27 in Dhaka, this hybrid variety is not only rich in antioxidants but also versatile in cooking. Whether steamed, roasted, stir-fried, or blended into soups, it delivers both flavor and health benefits. A fresh pick straight from local soil to your kitchen, this cauliflower is a colorful addition to healthy diets and plant-based recipes.
features: Naturally grown in local soil with minimal pesticide use
Rich in vitamins C, K, and folate for immune and bone health
Bright green florets add visual appeal to meals
Perfect for keto, vegan, and low-carb diets
Slightly nutty flavor ideal for both raw and cooked dishes
Hand-harvested for maximum freshness and quality
Packed and delivered fresh within 24 hours of harvesting
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at 0–4°C in a loosely closed bag or container. Do not wash until ready to use. Best consumed within 4–5 days of purchase.

reviews.comment: Loved the unique taste and vibrant color. Great for salads and roasting!
Fresh and high quality, but a bit pricier than white cauliflower.
Good quality, but I prefer the taste of regular cauliflower more.

name: Fresh Broccoli
description: Fresh Broccoli is a nutrient-rich green vegetable grown organically in the fertile lands of Rajshahi by Mohammad Ali at Farm 45. Known for its vibrant green florets and crisp stalks, this broccoli is ideal for steaming, roasting, stir-frying, or adding to salads. Packed with fiber, vitamins, and antioxidants, it's a staple in healthy diets and a go-to ingredient for fitness enthusiasts and home cooks alike. With no chemical pesticides or additives, every bundle brings freshness and wellness straight to your kitchen.
features: Organically grown without synthetic pesticides or chemicals
Packed with vitamin C, K, fiber, and antioxidants
Ideal for steaming, roasting, stir-frying, or salads
Crisp stalks and tightly packed florets ensure freshness
Harvested and packed within 24 hours of cutting
Supports heart health, immune function, and digestion
Suitable for vegan, keto, and low-calorie diets
storageInstructions: Store unwashed in the refrigerator in a breathable bag or loosely wrapped in a paper towel. Best consumed within 4–6 days. Wash thoroughly before cooking.

reviews.comment: Extremely fresh and crunchy! Perfect for my salads and stir-fry dishes.
Good quality broccoli, organic and flavorful. Would buy again.
Nice texture and taste, but slightly smaller bundles than expected.

name: Wildflower Honey
description: Wildflower Honey is a rich, aromatic natural sweetener harvested from the nectar of a diverse blend of wildflowers. Sourced directly from Dhaka’s local apiaries, this golden honey is collected with care by Shahnaz Parvin at Farm 37. Its deep flavor, floral notes, and smooth texture make it perfect for drizzling over toast, mixing into tea, or using in healthy baking recipes. Raw and unfiltered, this honey retains its natural enzymes, antioxidants, and antibacterial properties, making it not just a treat but a wellness booster.
features: Raw, unpasteurized, and unfiltered to retain nutrients
Rich in antioxidants and natural antibacterial properties
Smooth texture and naturally sweet floral flavor
No added sugar, colors, or preservatives
Perfect for tea, toast, yogurt, desserts, and baking
Supports local beekeeping and eco-friendly farming
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Do not refrigerate. Crystallization is natural—place the jar in warm water to liquefy.

reviews.comment: Absolutely love the rich floral taste and smooth texture. Perfect for my morning tea.
Great quality honey, very natural and pure. No added sweetness, just perfect.
Good honey with lovely aroma. Crystallized a bit but that’s natural and easy to fix.

name: Red Onions
description: These vibrant, fresh Red Onions are harvested from fertile lands in Jessore by local grower Karim Uddin at Sunrise Farm. Known for their bold flavor, crispy texture, and deep purplish-red color, these onions are a staple in Bengali cooking. Perfect for curries, salads, biryanis, and chutneys, red onions bring sharp taste and color to any dish. They are hand-picked, naturally grown, and delivered fresh to preserve their pungency and shelf life. A must-have in every kitchen.
features: Locally grown with care by smallholder farmers
Bold, pungent flavor ideal for savory dishes
Crisp texture and vibrant red-purple layers
Essential in Bengali, Indian, and Middle Eastern cuisine
Long shelf life when stored properly
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry, well-ventilated place. Avoid refrigeration to prevent softening. Do not store in plastic bags.

reviews.comment: Very fresh and flavorful onions. Perfect for my daily cooking needs.
Good quality onions with nice crispness. Lasted well without softening.
Loved the deep red color and strong flavor. Great for salads and biryanis.

name: Farm Fresh Eggs
description: Our Farm Fresh Eggs come from healthy, free-range hens raised on open pastures at Free Range Poultry in Kishoreganj. These organic, protein-rich eggs are laid by hens that roam freely, enjoying natural feed and clean environments. Each egg boasts a rich golden yolk, firm white, and superior flavor—perfect for frying, boiling, baking, or scrambling. Rich in nutrients and free from antibiotics or hormones, these eggs offer natural taste and nutrition with every bite.
features: Free-range raised hens with natural diets
High in protein and essential vitamins
Perfect for all types of cooking and baking
storageInstructions: Store eggs in the refrigerator at 4°C or below. Keep in original carton to retain freshness. Consume within 3 weeks of purchase for best taste and safety.

reviews.comment: Best eggs I've had in a long time. Fresh, tasty, and perfect for all my cooking needs.
Love that these are free-range and organic. The yolks are bright and flavorful.
Great quality eggs, firm whites, and they stay fresh longer than others I've bought.

name: Ripe Mangoes
description: Delicious, sun-ripened mangoes freshly harvested from the lush orchards of Sylhet. Carefully handpicked at peak ripeness by local farmer Sufia Begum, these mangoes are bursting with tropical sweetness, rich aroma, and soft, juicy flesh. Perfect for eating fresh, making smoothies, or preparing desserts, our organic mangoes are naturally grown without any synthetic chemicals, preserving their authentic taste and nutrition.
features: Ideal for juicing, smoothies, or direct consumption
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place. Once ripe, refrigerate to extend freshness. Best consumed within 5–7 days after ripening.

reviews.comment: Sweet and juicy mangoes, though a bit softer than I expected. Perfect for smoothies!
Good flavor but some were slightly underripe. Overall a decent buy for the price.
Lovely aroma and taste, great for desserts. Wish they lasted a bit longer after ripening.

name: Sweet Corn
description: Crisp, golden-yellow sweet corn grown in the fertile lands of Rangpur. Harvested at peak ripeness, each kernel bursts with juicy sweetness and flavor. Whether grilled, boiled, or added to soups and salads, this non-GMO corn is a delicious and versatile addition to any meal. Carefully grown by Anwar Hossain of Sweet Valley Farm using natural farming practices.
features: Ideal for boiling, roasting, or salads
storageInstructions: Store unshucked corn in the refrigerator and use within 3–5 days. For best flavor, cook soon after harvest.

reviews.comment: Sweet and fresh! Perfect for grilling and salads. Definitely a pantry staple now.
Good quality corn, very juicy kernels but slightly smaller than expected.
Loved the natural sweetness and freshness. Cooked it as boiled corn and it was delicious!
Crisp, juicy, and very fresh. Great for making corn soup. Highly recommend.

name: Brown Rice
description: Naturally grown brown rice with its nutritious bran layer intact. This whole grain rice is rich in fiber, essential minerals, and antioxidants. Grown by Jahanara Begum at Farm 41 in Khulna, this rice is minimally processed to retain its natural texture and nutty flavor. Ideal for health-conscious diets and perfect for making wholesome meals like khichuri, biryani, or grain bowls.
features: Whole grain and high in fiber
Ideal for diabetic and heart-healthy diets
storageInstructions: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place. Best used within 6 months for optimal freshness.

reviews.comment: Good quality rice with a nice nutty flavor. Takes a bit longer to cook but worth the health benefits.
Healthy option but the texture is a bit chewy for my liking. Great for biryani though!
Organic and fresh, but I wish it was a little softer after cooking. Overall, a good choice.
Perfect for healthy meals and has a nice natural flavor. I use it regularly for my family.

name: Fresh Lettuce
description: Crisp and naturally grown green lettuce leaves from Green Leaf Gardens in Gazipur. Packed with vitamins and minerals, these tender leaves are perfect for salads, wraps, burgers, and sandwiches. Grown organically using clean water and sustainable methods to preserve freshness, flavor, and nutrients. A must-have for healthy meal lovers.
features: Low in calories, high in fiber
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at 1–4°C. Store in a breathable vegetable bag or wrapped in a damp paper towel to maintain crispness. Use within 4–5 days.

reviews.comment: Very fresh and crisp! Tasted amazing in my chicken wrap. Will definitely buy again.
Good quality organic lettuce. Stayed fresh for 3 days in the fridge. Great for salads.
Very clean and no signs of chemicals. My kids love it in their sandwiches!

name: Fresh Potatoes
description: Farm-fresh potatoes grown in the fertile lands of Munshiganj, ideal for boiling, frying, baking, or mashing. These versatile tubers are a staple in every Bangladeshi kitchen, known for their smooth skin, dense texture, and earthy taste. Perfect for everyday meals, from curries to fries and stews.
features: Great source of energy and carbs
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry, and dark place away from onions. Avoid refrigeration to prevent starch-to-sugar conversion. Use within 3–4 weeks for best results.

reviews.comment: These potatoes are great for mashed dishes and fries. Very fresh and clean.
Good value for money. The size was consistent and they cooked well.
Stayed fresh for weeks. Loved using them in curries and bharta.

name: Sweet Pineapple
description: Juicy, sweet, and mildly tangy pineapples harvested from the tropical fields of Tangail. These golden-fleshed fruits are packed with flavor and nutrition — perfect for fresh juices, fruit salads, smoothies, or as a refreshing standalone snack. Each piece delivers a burst of tropical sunshine in every bite.
features: Perfect blend of sweetness and acidity
Rich in vitamin C and digestive enzymes
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature until ripe. Once ripe, refrigerate and consume within 3–4 days for best flavor. For cut pineapple, refrigerate in an airtight container and consume within 2 days.

reviews.comment: One of the juiciest pineapples I’ve ever had. So sweet and fresh — it reminded me of my childhood summers!
Excellent flavor and very fragrant. Great for smoothies. I just wish the pieces were a little bigger.
Perfect balance of sweet and tangy. Loved it in my fruit salad. Will definitely reorder!

name: Guava
description: Fresh, juicy guavas harvested from the fertile farms of Khulna. These guavas are known for their sweet aroma, crunchy texture, and rich vitamin content. Ideal for eating raw, juicing, or adding to desserts and salads. A nutritious tropical fruit loved across Bangladesh.
features: Rich in Vitamin C and fiber
Versatile for raw eating or cooking
storageInstructions: Keep guavas refrigerated at 4°C to extend freshness. Consume within 5–7 days for optimal taste and nutrition.

reviews.comment: Crisp and sweet! The guavas arrived fresh and smelled amazing. My whole family enjoyed them.
Really fresh and flavorful. Great for making guava juice. I just wish the size was a bit more uniform.
Excellent quality. Loved the crunch and natural sweetness. Will definitely buy again from Farm 46.

name: Fresh Mint Leaves
description: Handpicked fresh mint leaves from Aromatic Herbs Farm in Mymensingh, bursting with a refreshing aroma and vibrant green color. Ideal for enhancing teas, salads, sauces, and various culinary dishes with a cool, invigorating flavor.
features: Perfect for teas, cooking, and garnishing
storageInstructions: Store wrapped in a damp paper towel inside a sealed container in the refrigerator. Use within 5-7 days for best freshness and aroma.

reviews.comment: The mint was incredibly fresh and fragrant! I used it in my tea and chutney — made everything taste amazing.
Very clean and vibrant leaves. The aroma filled my kitchen the moment I opened the packet. Highly recommended!
Perfect for garnish and flavoring dishes. Stays fresh longer than other brands I’ve tried. Will reorder soon!

name: Fresh Bananas
description: Yellow ripe bananas harvested from Tropical Fruits Farm in Patuakhali, Bangladesh. These bananas are naturally sweet, rich in potassium and dietary fiber, making them a healthy and delicious snack or ingredient for smoothies, desserts, and breakfast dishes.
storageInstructions: Store at room temperature away from direct sunlight. To slow ripening, refrigerate once bananas are ripe; peel may darken but fruit remains fresh. Avoid storing near ethylene-sensitive fruits.

reviews.comment: Perfectly ripe and sweet. These bananas are great for smoothies and taste even better than store-bought ones.
Arrived fresh and in great condition. The kids love them as snacks. Will be ordering again!
Good value and fresh. A couple of bananas were slightly overripe but still delicious.

name: Sundarbans Honey
description: Pure, high-quality honey sourced from the wildflowers of the Sundarbans forest in Khulna, Bangladesh. Known for its rich aroma, golden color, and natural sweetness, this honey is packed with antioxidants and beneficial enzymes, making it a healthy choice for sweetening foods and beverages or as a natural remedy.
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the container tightly sealed to prevent moisture absorption and crystallization. Do not refrigerate.

reviews.comment: Absolutely pure and fragrant! I use it in my morning tea, and it enhances the flavor wonderfully.
You can really tell this honey is natural. Great quality and value for the price.
Tastes amazing and works great in home remedies. Will definitely reorder!

name: Lychees
description: Fresh and juicy lychees cultivated by local farmers in Chittagong, Bangladesh. These lychees have a sweet, floral flavor and a refreshing aroma, making them perfect for eating fresh or adding to desserts and beverages. Known for their bright red skin and succulent white flesh, they are a popular tropical fruit rich in vitamins and antioxidants.
features: Ideal for fresh eating or desserts
storageInstructions: Store lychees in a cool, dry place or refrigerate in a perforated plastic bag to maintain freshness. Consume within 3-5 days for optimal taste.

reviews.comment: Very sweet and fresh lychees! They were perfectly ripe and flavorful. Highly recommend during summer!
Nice taste but a few were slightly overripe. Still good overall and great for the price.
Love the freshness and aroma! Used them in a fruit salad and everyone loved it.

name: Forest Honey
description: Premium forest honey harvested from wildflowers in the Sylhet region of Bangladesh. This honey is known for its rich aroma, smooth texture, and natural sweetness. Sourced sustainably from local farmers, it offers a pure taste of the forest with natural health benefits including antioxidants and antimicrobial properties.
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the container tightly sealed to prevent moisture absorption and crystallization. Avoid refrigeration to maintain smooth texture.

nutritionalInformation.minerals: Calcium, iron, magnesium in trace amounts

reviews.comment: The aroma is incredible! I use it in my herbal tea and even for skincare. So pure and fresh!
Good quality and packaging, but a bit sweeter than expected. Still love that it's natural and local.
One of the best forest honeys I've tasted. Smooth, aromatic, and perfect for toast or warm water!

name: Fresh Cheese
description: Creamy, fresh cheese made from locally sourced milk in Chittagong, Bangladesh. This high-quality cheese offers a mild, slightly tangy flavor, perfect for snacks, cooking, and adding richness to meals. Produced with care by local farmers, it brings authentic taste and nutrition to your table.
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated between 2°C and 5°C. Store in an airtight container to maintain freshness. Consume within 7-10 days after opening.

reviews.comment: Very creamy and delicious! Great in sandwiches and melts well when heated. Will buy again!
Good texture but a bit too mild in flavor for my taste. Works best with spicy dishes.
Fresh and organic as promised. My kids love it on toast. Packaging could be better though.

name: Pure Honey
description: 100% pure natural honey harvested from wildflowers in Sylhet, Bangladesh. This raw, unprocessed honey retains all natural enzymes and antioxidants, offering a rich, sweet flavor and numerous health benefits. Perfect for sweetening, cooking, or medicinal use.
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the container tightly closed to prevent moisture absorption. Avoid refrigeration to maintain texture and flavor.

reviews.comment: Absolutely the best pure honey I've ever tasted. Rich, smooth, and full of flavor. Highly recommend!
Perfectly raw and natural. Love using it in my morning tea and for medicinal purposes.
Great texture and sweetness. Packaging was secure and product arrived fresh.

name: Basmati Rice
description: Premium aromatic basmati rice grown in the fertile fields of Dinajpur, Bangladesh. Known for its long grains, distinctive fragrance, and fluffy texture, this rice is perfect for biryani, pulao, and everyday meals. Carefully harvested and processed to retain quality and flavor.
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container to preserve freshness and prevent moisture. Keep away from strong odors and sunlight.

reviews.comment: Absolutely loved this basmati rice! The aroma and fluffiness made my biryani stand out. Highly recommend for any rice lover.
Good quality rice with a nice fragrance. Cooked perfectly and tastes great, though a bit pricey.
This rice is the best I've had from local farms. Perfect for special dishes and everyday meals alike.

name: Fresh Tomatoes
description: Juicy red tomatoes grown in the fertile fields of Comilla, Bangladesh. Ideal for curries, salads, and sauces, these tomatoes are known for their vibrant color, rich flavor, and perfect balance of sweetness and acidity. Freshly harvested and packed to ensure quality.
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Avoid refrigeration to preserve flavor and texture. Use within 5-7 days for best freshness.

reviews.comment: These tomatoes are incredibly fresh and juicy. Perfect for making rich curries!
Bright color and good taste. They add a nice tang to my salads.
Good quality tomatoes, though a bit soft when delivered. Still excellent for sauces.

name: Himsagar Mangoes
description: Sweet and juicy Himsagar mangoes, often hailed as the king of fruits. These mangoes are prized for their rich aroma, smooth texture, and delicious sweetness, freshly harvested from Chapainawabganj, Bangladesh.
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place. For best taste, consume fresh or refrigerate for up to 5 days after ripening.

reviews.comment: Absolutely delicious mangoes! Sweet, juicy, and fragrant. Highly recommend.
The texture is so smooth and the flavor is amazing. Best Himsagar I've had in years.
Very tasty and fresh. A little pricey but worth every penny for the quality.

name: Fresh Milk
description: Pure fresh milk sourced from local dairy farms in Sirajganj, Bangladesh. Rich in calcium and essential nutrients, perfect for daily consumption.
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at or below 4°C. Consume within 3 days after opening for best freshness.

reviews.comment: The freshest milk I've had in a long time! Perfect for my family.
Good quality milk with rich taste. Slightly pricey but worth it.
Love the creamy texture and freshness. Highly recommend!

name: Coriander Leaves
description: Fresh coriander leaves, perfect for garnishing, cooking, and enhancing flavor with their aromatic freshness.
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated and use within 3 days for optimal freshness and aroma.

reviews.comment: Very fresh and aromatic coriander. Adds great flavor to my dishes.
Good quality leaves, stayed fresh longer than expected.
Love the organic quality and freshness. Perfect for garnishing.

name: Red Lentils
description: High quality red lentils from local farmers, perfect for dal and rich in protein.
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight. Use within 6 months for best quality.

reviews.comment: Excellent quality lentils, cooks well and tastes great.
Good lentils with a fresh taste, perfect for dal.
Decent lentils, consistent quality and affordable price.

name: Green Beans
description: High quality green beans from local farmers, great for stir-fries and salads.
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated and consume within 3-4 days for best freshness.

reviews.comment: Very fresh and crisp green beans. Perfect for my salads!
Good quality beans with nice texture, though a bit pricey.
Loved the freshness and flavor, great for stir-fries.

name: Jackfruit
description: High quality jackfruits from local farmers, sweet and versatile.
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place. Consume within a week after cutting.

reviews.comment: Delicious and sweet jackfruits! Very fresh and juicy.
Good quality jackfruit, but a few pieces were a bit overripe.
Great taste and aroma. Perfect for desserts and snacks.

name: Mangrove Honey
description: High quality honey from local farmers, sourced from Sundarbans mangroves.
features: Distinctive Flavor Profile Unique to Mangrove Honey
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

reviews.comment: Absolutely pure and delicious honey. Love the natural sweetness and aroma!
Great quality honey with a unique flavor from the mangroves. Perfect for my tea.
Very fresh and natural. The texture and taste are amazing, highly recommend.

name: Fresh Yogurt
description: High quality yogurt from local farmers, creamy and tangy, made with traditional methods ensuring rich flavor and probiotics.
features: Contains live probiotics for gut health
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at or below 4°C. Consume within 7 days after opening. Shake gently before use.

reviews.comment: Excellent creamy texture and fresh taste. Perfect for breakfast smoothies! I feel it really helps my digestion because of the probiotics.
Good quality yogurt, very fresh and natural. I prefer it a bit tangier but it’s perfect for making desserts and raitas.
Love the local flavor and the freshness. No preservatives, so it tastes pure and natural. My kids enjoy it every day.

name: Basil Leaves
description: High quality basil leaves from local farmers, aromatic and fresh, perfect for garnishing and enhancing the flavor of your dishes.
storageInstructions: Store in a perforated plastic bag in the refrigerator. Keep leaves dry and avoid crushing to maintain freshness for up to 7 days.

reviews.comment: Absolutely fresh and fragrant basil leaves! They elevate the taste of my dishes and last long when stored properly.
Good quality basil, very aromatic and clean. Would love if the bunch was a bit bigger but overall very satisfied.
Perfect for my homemade pesto and salads. Organic and pesticide-free, I trust these leaves for healthy cooking.

name: Barley
description: High quality barley from local farmers, ideal for soups, brewing, and nutritious meals.
features: Ideal for soups, stews, and brewing
Good source of dietary fiber and protein
Non-GMO and free from artificial additives
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container. Keep away from moisture and direct sunlight to maintain freshness for several months.

reviews.comment: Excellent quality barley! Perfect for my homemade soups and porridge. Clean and fresh every time.
Good barley grain, cooks well and tastes great in my brewing experiments. Would prefer organic though.
Fresh and locally sourced, this barley has good texture and flavor. Packaging could be improved.

name: Eggplant
description: High quality eggplants from local farmers, perfect for curries and a variety of dishes.
features: Ideal for curries, grilling, and roasting
Rich in antioxidants and dietary fiber
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place or refrigerate wrapped in paper to maintain freshness up to one week. Avoid direct sunlight and moisture.

reviews.comment: These eggplants were fresh and perfect for my traditional curry recipes. The quality is consistent every time.
Good quality and firm eggplants, cooked well and tasted fresh. Would love to see a bit larger size next time.
Organic and fresh product. The texture was great, and it added excellent flavor to my grilled dishes.

name: Pomegranates
description: High quality pomegranates from local farmers, juicy and antioxidant-rich, perfect for fresh eating and juicing.
features: Excellent source of Vitamin C and fiber
Perfect for fresh consumption and juicing
Bright red arils with sweet-tart flavor
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place or refrigerate for up to two weeks. Avoid bruising for best freshness.

reviews.comment: The pomegranates were very fresh and juicy. Loved the natural sweetness and the freshness was unmatched.
Great quality fruits, perfect for making fresh juice. A bit pricey but worth it for the taste.
Bright red and delicious. The seeds were juicy and had a perfect balance of sweet and tart flavors.

name: Mustard Honey
description: High quality honey from local farmers, sourced from mustard fields, known for its unique floral aroma and rich taste.
features: Locally sourced from mustard flower fields
Rich in antioxidants and natural enzymes
Distinct floral aroma and smooth texture
Ideal for sweetening and medicinal uses
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Avoid moisture to prevent fermentation. Keep container tightly closed.

nutritionalInformation.vitamins: Contains trace amounts of B vitamins and minerals

reviews.comment: The mustard honey has a wonderful floral taste and a lovely aroma. Perfectly natural and pure. Highly recommended!
Great quality honey, rich and smooth texture. It works great in tea and as a natural sweetener.
Very pure and fresh honey. I love its health benefits and the natural sweetness it adds to my dishes.

name: Butter
description: High quality butter from local farmers, rich and creamy with a fresh natural taste.
features: Freshly churned from local dairy farms
Rich, creamy texture and natural flavor
Ideal for cooking, baking, and spreading
High in healthy fats and fat-soluble vitamins
Supports local farmers and sustainable farming
Smooth consistency and natural golden color
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated below 5°C. Store in an airtight container to preserve freshness and prevent absorption of odors.

nutritionalInformation.vitamins: Rich in Vitamins A, D, E, and K2

reviews.comment: The butter has an amazing creamy texture and pure fresh taste. Perfect for my baking needs!
Good quality organic butter. Great flavor and texture, makes cooking richer.
Very fresh and natural butter from local farmers. I appreciate the organic sourcing.

name: Parsley
description: High quality parsley from local farmers, fresh and aromatic, perfect for cooking and garnishing.
features: Rich in vitamins A, C, and K
Perfect for culinary use and garnishing
Supports local farmers and sustainable agriculture
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated in a sealed plastic bag or container to maintain freshness. Use within 5-7 days.

nutritionalInformation.vitamins: High in Vitamins A, C, and K

reviews.comment: Extremely fresh parsley with a strong aroma. Perfect for my salads and garnishes.
Good quality and very aromatic. Adds great flavor to my cooking.
Fresh and organic parsley. Definitely supports local farmers.

name: Millet
description: High quality millet from local farmers, nutritious and versatile, ideal for porridges, breads, and more.
features: Rich in fiber and essential minerals
storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container. Best used within 6 months for optimal freshness.

nutritionalInformation.minerals: High in magnesium, phosphorus, and iron

reviews.comment: Great quality millet, cooks nicely and tastes good in my porridge.
Good value for money, fresh and clean grains. Perfect for gluten-free recipes.
Love the taste and texture, very versatile and healthy option.

name: Okra
description: High quality okra from local farmers, perfect for stir-fries, curries, and rich in dietary fiber.
features: Rich in dietary fiber and vitamins
storageInstructions: Keep okra in a perforated plastic bag in the refrigerator. Use within 2-3 days for optimal freshness.

nutritionalInformation.vitamins: High in Vitamin C and Vitamin K

reviews.comment: Fresh and tender okra, cooks well in my curries. Great quality!
Nice texture and flavor. The okra stays fresh for days when refrigerated properly.
Love the organic quality and freshness. Perfect for stir-fries and soups.

name: Watermelons
description: High quality watermelons from local farmers, sweet, juicy, and refreshing — perfect for summer snacks and beverages.
storageInstructions: Store whole watermelons at room temperature. Once cut, refrigerate and consume within 2-3 days for best taste.

nutritionalInformation.vitamins: High in Vitamin C and Vitamin A

reviews.comment: The watermelons were incredibly sweet and fresh! Perfect for hot days.
Good quality and very juicy. Delivered fresh and well-packaged.
Loved the local taste and texture. Great for juices and salads.

name: Chickpeas
description: High quality chickpeas from local farmers, perfect for curries and snacks.
detailedDescription: Our chickpeas are carefully harvested and cleaned to ensure premium quality. These legumes are rich in protein, fiber, and essential vitamins, making them a nutritious staple for your kitchen. Perfect for traditional curries, salads, and snacks, they offer a nutty flavor and firm texture.
storage: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep in an airtight container to maintain freshness and prevent moisture absorption. Proper storage can extend shelf life up to 12 months.

reviews.comment: These chickpeas are very fresh and cook perfectly every time. I love how they add great texture to my curries.
Good quality chickpeas, slightly smaller than usual but taste is excellent. Will buy again.
Nice local produce and fairly priced. They soak and cook well without any bitterness.

name: Cucumbers
description: High quality cucumbers from local farmers, crisp and refreshing.
detailedDescription: Our cucumbers are handpicked fresh from local farms, known for their crisp texture and refreshing taste. Ideal for salads, pickling, and hydration, these cucumbers are packed with essential nutrients and natural antioxidants.
storage: Store cucumbers in the refrigerator, ideally wrapped in a paper towel and placed inside a plastic bag to maintain moisture without excess condensation. Use within 1 week for optimal freshness.

reviews.comment: The cucumbers are really fresh and crunchy. Perfect for my daily salads!
Good quality cucumbers, stayed fresh for a week in my fridge.
Nice local produce with a great taste. A bit small in size but very fresh.
